407.sentence: 3) Phone is kinda heavy, but small in size.

408.sentence: 4) Buttons are quite small and is really a pain exp if one is fond of text messaging.

409.sentence: There will be much erasing of text as, one would tend to type something instead of the actual letters.

410.sentence: 5) Video recorder is of no use and one cannot record something useful in 10 seconds and it takes a while to send the same through the "Free picture and video messaging" offered by service provider.

411.sentence: The bottom line is "Phone is cool one - only for the moment, as its the latest phone in the market and has all the new features, but this will soon be displaced by upcoming newer phones".

412.sentence: so, right out of the box i had issue.

414.sentence: after scouring the various boards i find this is an arbitrary and pervasive problem.

415.sentence: but, i am quite unhappy with nokia at the moment.

416.sentence: if you are looking for a phone to integrate as easily as the sonyericsson phones with iSync, i say stick with a sonyericsson.

417.sentence: if there was a zero-star rating i would give it.

432.sentence: Picture and video quality is ok.

444.sentence: This phone is one of the milestones in the history of the cellular phones.

445.sentence: Supporting an operating system, Symbian OS, you can download and run a lot of programs on this phone.

446.sentence: You can turn this phone into a gaming machine, a camcorder or a digital camera, an mp3-player, a movie viewer, a voice recorder, a personal secretary, a GPS map browser, a book, a multifunction remote controller, practically everything that you can do with the computer, plus it is a phone(!!) and also you can carry it in your pocket :).

447.sentence: You can turn this phone into a gaming machine, a camcorder or a digital camera, an mp3-player, a movie viewer, a voice recorder, a personal secretary, a GPS map browser, a book, a multifunction remote controller, practically everything that you can do with the computer, plus it is a phone(!!) and also you can carry it in your pocket :).

448.sentence: Many of these programs are shareware, some can be purchased by paying a little bit of bucks.

449.sentence: It uses the extendable MMC memory, it is perfect for storing videos, pictures and mp3s.

450.sentence: Its nice look is also a plus.

451.sentence: And also, since it is tri band and since it uses SIM-card, you can just use it in Europe and many other parts of the world, wherever GSM exists.

452.sentence: I am just in love with this phone, especially after using a more primitve phone about 3 years.
